casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Twanprece N. IVEY. No. 458PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Clinton C. Hicks, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of December 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Twanprece N. Ivey) shall have up to and including the 20th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2005."
